languages.text: "Ваша Cветлость, позвольте вмешаться. Когда мы прибыли в систему, мои люди, согласно стандартным протоколам, провели учет всех доступных каналов связи в регионе. Среди них была станция {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}. Станция хранит полное вокс-молчание, однако даже само присутствие ее здесь внушает надежду. Отыскать навигатора в той же системе, где мы находимся — невероятная удача, настоящее благоволение Бога-Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Cветлость, позвольте вмешаться. Когда мы прибыли в систему, мои люди, согласно стандартным протоколам, провели учет всех доступных каналов связи в регионе. Среди них была станция {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}. Станция хранит полное вокс-молчание, однако даже само присутствие ее здесь внушает надежду. Отыскать Навигатора в той же системе, где мы находимся — невероятная удача, настоящее благоволение Бога-Императора".

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. The station maintains complete vox-silence, but even its presence here inspires hope. To have located a Navigator in the very same system is an incredible stroke of luck, a true blessing from the God-Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Cветлость, позвольте вмешаться. Когда мы прибыли в систему, мои люди, согласно стандартным протоколам, провели учет всех доступных каналов связи в регионе. Среди них была станция {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}. Станция хранит полное вокс-молчание, однако даже само присутствие ее здесь внушает надежду. Отыскать навигатора в той же системе, где мы находимся — невероятная удача, настоящее благоволение Бога-Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. The station maintains complete vox-silence, but even its presence here inspires hope. To have located a Navigator in the very same system is an incredible stroke of luck, a true blessing from the God-Emperor."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. It might be difficult to persuade them to assign us a new Navigator, but we have no other choice. Although one detail does concern me — the station has not responded to our messages and appears to be maintaining complete vox-silence."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. The station maintains complete vox-silence, but even its presence here inspires hope. To have located a Navigator in the very same system is an incredible stroke of luck, a true blessing from the God-Emperor."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. The station maintains complete vox-silence, but even its presence here inspires hope. To have located a Navigator in the very same system is an incredible stroke of luck, a true blessing from the God-Emperor."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. The station maintains complete vox-silence, but even its presence here inspires hope. To have located a Navigator in the very same system is an incredible stroke of luck, a true blessing from the God-Emperor."

languages.text: “请允许我插一下话，舰长大人。我们当初抵达这个星系时，我的仆人遵循标准协议，对这片地区所有可用的通信渠道进行了统计，而其中一个渠道来自{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}的星站。尽管他们的音阵系统似乎处于完全静默状态，但这样的发现仍然令人心生希望。能在同一个星系里找到导航者家族，这实在是幸运得令人难以置信。这肯定是神皇本人赐予我们的祝福。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. The station maintains complete vox-silence, but even its presence here inspires hope. To have located a Navigator in the very same system is an incredible stroke of luck, a true blessing from the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我插一下话，舰长大人。我们当初抵达这个星系时，我的人遵循标准协议，对这片地区所有可用的通信渠道进行了统计，而其中一个渠道来自{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}的星站。说服他们为我们指派一位新的导航者或许会很困难，但我们恐怕别无选择。不过，有个细节让我很担心：他们的星站并没有回复我们的信息。他们的音阵系统似乎处于完全静默状态。”

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte gestattet mir einen kurzen Einwurf – als wir in diesem System ankamen, folgte meine Crew den Standardprotokollen und erstellte eine Liste aller verfügbaren Kommunikationskanäle in der Region. Einer davon war eine Station der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Die Station hält vollständige Vox-Stille, aber allein ihre Gegenwart hier sorgt für Hoffnung. Dass wir im selben System einen Navigator gefunden haben, ist ein unglaublicher Glücksfall, ein wahrer Segen des Gottimperators."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. The station maintains complete vox-silence, but even its presence here inspires hope. To have located a Navigator in the very same system is an incredible stroke of luck, a true blessing from the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, bitte gestattet mir einen kurzen Einwurf – als wir in diesem System ankamen, folgte meine Crew den Standardprotokollen und erstellte eine Liste aller verfügbaren Kommunikationskanäle in der Region. Einer davon war eine Station der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Es könnte schwierig werden, sie dazu zu bringen, uns einen neuen Navigator zu überlassen, aber wir haben keine andere Wahl. Ein Detail beunruhigt mich allerdings – die Station hat nicht auf unsere Nachrichten reagiert und hält anscheinend komplette Vox-Stille."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, si vous me permettez d'intervenir... À notre arrivée dans ce système, mon équipe a suivi le protocole habituel et effectué un inventaire de tous les canaux de communication disponibles dans la région. L'un d'entre eux appartenait à une station de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Si elle observe un silence-vox absolu, sa seule présence est source d'espoir. C'est une chance inouïe que d'avoir localisé un navigateur ici même, une véritable bénédiction de l'Empereur-Dieu. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. The station maintains complete vox-silence, but even its presence here inspires hope. To have located a Navigator in the very same system is an incredible stroke of luck, a true blessing from the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, si vous me permettez d'intervenir... À notre arrivée dans ce système, mon équipe a suivi le protocole habituel et effectué un inventaire de tous les canaux de communication disponibles dans la région. L'un d'entre eux appartenait à une station de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. Il sera peut-être difficile de les convaincre de nous confier un nouveau navigateur, mais nous n'avons pas d'autre choix. Un détail me préoccupe cependant : la station n'a répondu à aucun de nos messages et semble observer un silence-vox absolu. »

languages.text: 「陛下、少々よろしいでしょうか。この星系に到達した際に、私のクルーは標準プロトコルに従い、対象地域で接続できるすべての通信チャンネルを算出しました。そのうちのひとつは、{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}ステーションです。ステーションのヴォクスから全く返事はありませんが、ここにステーションがあるというだけで希望が湧いてきます。ちょうど同じ星系で航宙士を見つけられるなんて、信じられないほど風向きが良い。まさに神帝陛下からの祝福です」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. The station maintains complete vox-silence, but even its presence here inspires hope. To have located a Navigator in the very same system is an incredible stroke of luck, a true blessing from the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、少々よろしいでしょうか。この星系に到達した際に、私のクルーは標準プロトコルに従い、対象地域で接続できるすべての通信チャンネルを算出しました。そのうちのひとつは、{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}ステーションです。ステーションのヴォクスから全く返事はありませんが、ここにステーションがあるというだけで希望が湧いてきます。ちょうど同じ星系で航宙士を見つけられるなんて、信じられないほど風向きが良い。まさに神帝陛下からの祝福です」

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, si me permite interceder... Cuando llegamos a este sistema, mi tripulación siguió los protocolos reglamentarios y realizó un conteo de todos los canales de comunicación disponibles en la región. Uno de ellos pertenece a una estación de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. La estación mantiene silencio de voco completo, pero su mera presencia es inspiradora. Encontrar a un navegante en el mismo sistema es una suerte increíble, un don del Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. The station maintains complete vox-silence, but even its presence here inspires hope. To have located a Navigator in the very same system is an incredible stroke of luck, a true blessing from the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, si me permite interceder... Cuando llegamos a este sistema, mi tripulación siguió los protocolos básicos y realizó un conteo de todos los canales de comunicación disponibles en la región. Uno de ellos pertenece a una estación de la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}. No será fácil convencerles para que nos entreguen a un Navegante, pero no tenemos otra opción. Sin embargo, hay un detalle que me preocupa: la estación no ha respondido a nuestros mensajes y parece haberse sumido en absoluto vocosilencio».

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, müsaadenizle araya gireceğim. Bu sisteme girdiğimizde ekibim standart prosedürü uygulayıp bölgedeki mevcut tüm iletişim kanallarını taradı. Bunlardan biri de bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} istasyonuydu. İstasyon, voks iletişimine tamamen kapalı olsa da buradaki varlığı bile umut verici. Aynı sistemde Rotacı bulmak büyük bir şans, Tanrı İmparator'dan hakiki bir lütuf."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, if you will allow me to interject — when we arrived in this system, my crew followed standard protocols and conducted a count of all the available communication channels in the region. One of them was a {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} station. The station maintains complete vox-silence, but even its presence here inspires hope. To have located a Navigator in the very same system is an incredible stroke of luck, a true blessing from the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, müsaadenizle araya gireceğim. Bu sisteme girdiğimizde ekibim standart prosedürü uygulayıp bölgedeki mevcut tüm iletişim kanallarını taradı. Bunlardan biri de bir {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} istasyonuydu. İstasyon, voks iletişimine tamamen kapalı olsa da buradaki varlığı bile umut verici. Aynı sistemde Rotacı bulmak büyük bir şans, Tanrı İmparator'dan hakiki bir lütuf."
